Title: Billing and invoicing for paid activities

Description:

Implement invoice generation, discounts and invoice status tracking for paid enrollments.

Acceptance criteria:
- Invoice model with lines (items) linked to plans/services.
- Calculate totals, taxes, discounts and pending amount.
- Invoice statuses: Paid, Partial, Unpaid, Overpaid.
- Endpoint to view and apply payments to invoices.

Notes:
- Can be deferred until payments are required.
